WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed in r48604.  The options to ignore spirit and hit will now only apply to items.
WorkItem.Description: Been a couple of versions now, at least .12 and .13, the stats additive buff from Mark of the Wild (and Improved) or the Drums have disappeared from the buff list. Since the +37 int and +37 spirit is nearly more than twice any gemming combo, it might throw off some gearing, or gemming/enchanting.

Comments.Message: Guessing they're being considered irrelevant due to Spirit?

By user option, yes.

A work around is to uncheck the "Ignore Spirit" option.  I'll have a more permanent solution in the next version.
